snippet: Twelve students barricaded themselves inside an eighth-floor room at the top of the college building to urge the school not to begin charging tuition to undergraduates.
abstract: Twelve students barricaded themselves inside an eighth-floor room at the top of the college building to urge the school not to begin charging tuition to undergraduates.

headline.main: Students Seize Cooper Union Room to Protest Possible Tuition

keywords.name: organizations
